name: Eurocode 4: Design of Composite Steel and Concrete Structures - Part 1-1: General Rules and Rules for Buildings
description: Eurocode 4 Part 1-1 provides general rules for the design of composite steel-concrete structures including materials, structural analysis, and design of structural members.

rules.name: Composite Material Properties
rules.description: Composite structures shall use appropriate steel and concrete grades

actions.message: Composite elements must use appropriate steel grades per EN 1994-1-1-3.1.1

rules.name: Concrete Strength for Composite
rules.description: Concrete in composite structures shall have specified strength

actions.message: Concrete in composite elements must have minimum strength of 20 MPa per EN 1994-1-1-3.2.1

rules.name: Structural Analysis - Composite Action
rules.description: Composite action shall be considered in structural analysis

actions.message: Composite action must be considered in analysis per EN 1994-1-1-4.1.1

rules.name: Ultimate Limit States - Bending
rules.description: Composite sections shall be verified for bending resistance

actions.message: Composite elements must be verified for bending per EN 1994-1-1-5.1.1

rules.name: Ultimate Limit States - Shear
rules.description: Composite sections shall be verified for shear resistance

actions.message: Composite elements must be verified for shear per EN 1994-1-1-5.2.1

rules.name: Serviceability Limit States - Deflection
rules.description: Deflection limits shall be checked for composite structures

actions.message: Deflection limits should be checked for composite structures per EN 1994-1-1-6.1.1

rules.name: Detailing - Shear Connectors
rules.description: Shear connectors shall be provided for composite action

actions.message: Shear connectors must be provided for composite action per EN 1994-1-1-7.1.1

rules.name: Detailing - Minimum Cover
rules.description: Minimum concrete cover shall be provided in composite structures

actions.message: Minimum concrete cover of 20mm must be provided in composite structures per EN 1994-1-1-8.1.1

rules.name: Detailing - Longitudinal Reinforcement
rules.description: Longitudinal reinforcement shall be provided in composite slabs

actions.message: Longitudinal reinforcement ratio of 0.2% must be provided in composite slabs per EN 1994-1-1-9.1.1

rules.name: Detailing - Transverse Reinforcement
rules.description: Transverse reinforcement shall be provided in composite slabs

actions.message: Transverse reinforcement ratio of 0.2% must be provided in composite slabs per EN 1994-1-1-10.1.1
